name: Cloud (itch) (awesome_cyn3)
description:
Cloud 

By: Cynthia Carrillo Contreras 

Description: 
                Be a Happy Cloud 
Try to win by matching 100 Clouds 

                       Enjoy!  :) 

Controls: 

- Press S to Start

- Press R to Restart 

- Press Q or ESC to Quit 

- To move you the arrow keys or W,A,S,D

- Change Shape by pressing the following: 

- T = Tree
- P = Panda
- H = Hat 
- B = Bird 

Screen Settings: 

1024 x 768 Windows 

Checking "Windowed" helps if it looks weird
